newsitem.title: USA: Vanguard Airlines November load off.
newsitem.headline: Vanguard Airlines November load off.

text.p: Vanguard Airlines Inc said Tuesday that its November passenger load factor declined 1.37 points to 49.55 percent from 50.92 percent a year ago.
Revenue passenger miles gained to 42,890 from 23,458 and available seat miles increased to 86,558 from 46,072.

Year to date, the carrier said its load factor advanced 9.64 points to 61.38 from 51.74 percent. Revenue passenger miles rose to 613,680 from 258,825, and available seat miles increased to 999,865 from 500,259.
